dialogue.introduction: I'm Repair ship Akashi. If you take a little damage, I can fix you up in the base. Just leave it to me!
dialogue.library_intro: I'm Akashi, the only dedicated repair ship in the combined fleet. I was in charge of repairing ships damaged in the front lines when I was stationed in the Truk Anchorage. I supported the fleet from behind right up until the destruction of the Anchorage. Pleased to meet you.
dialogue.secretary2: Admiral, you need repairs? Have you been damaged somewhere?
dialogue.secretary3: It's dangerous, so don't touch my cranes... hey! That's even more dangerous!
dialogue.secretaryidle: Right... don't worry! I'm busy with things such as repairs and procuring new machinery! So don't worry! ... really...
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiral... you've gotta make sure you fix yourself up sometimes. Just leave the maintenance... to me, okay?
dialogue.wedding: Admiral, what is it? You want to process the ring in my factory? Geez... I wonder who the lucky person is? Ehh... for me?! No way...! I-I'll treasure it! Thank you!
dialogue.show_players_score: Do you want to check the fleet's operational status, Admiral?
dialogue.equipment1: Now...this is what I call progress!
dialogue.equipment2: Now I can repair even more! Thank you so much!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: I guess even I need maintenance once in a while...
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Phew... what a blessing it is to have people washing my back. Thanks so much.
dialogue.ship_construction: It seems like a new ship has been completed. Looking forward to it.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet has returned safely. Phew.
dialogue.battle_start: Fighting isn't my... well... but I guess I'll just have to do it!
dialogue.night_battle: A pursuit... w-what am I supposed to do about that?!
dialogue.night_attack: It's not my forte, but here we go...!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: It's not my forte, but here we go...!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: It's not my forte, but here we go...!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: It's not my forte, but here we go...!
dialogue.mvp: Eh...EEEEEH!? M-me!? How did that happen...? Well, can't say I'm not happy...
dialogue.minor_damaged1: Geh... ouch... is my factory fine?
dialogue.minor_damaged2: I'm hit...don't let the fire spread to the work machines!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: I...I was targetted!? I can't do a good repair job in this state!
dialogue.sunk: Seems like I'm heading towards the sea floor... guess I can have another long sleep. Good night.
dialogue.white_day_2015: Admiral, are there any return gifts? It's almost done? Ooyodo & I were looking forward to this y'know! Right?!
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Admiral, congratulations on the two years anniversary! We kept fighting to the bitter end for two years! Excellent!
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: It is the rainy season. The Arsenal is going to rust... I should perform a good maintenance on it and oil things.
dialogue.early_summer_2015: It's summer! I sorta want a flashy swimsuit as well. Admiral! I wouldn't mind if you bought one for me! Sparkle! Heehee ♪
dialogue.fall_2015: Autumn has come. It's a season that empties your belly somewhat. Mamiya, I missed you!
dialogue.christmas_2015: Merry Christmas, Admiral! Should I put up lights on the cranes?
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Setsubun, eh... Sounds good to me. Come on, Ooyodo. You will be the demon. Eh, Me!? Why!?
dialogue.improvement_open_arsenal: Good job, admiral! Welcome to Akashi's Arsenal!
dialogue.improvement_equipment_list: So, which piece of equipment do you want to improve? Right now you can improve these pieces of equipment.
dialogue.improvement_choose_equipment: This piece of equipment, right? So it's gonna be this one!
dialogue.improvement_choose_10_equipment: You can also upgrade it to a better version!
dialogue.improvement_start: Alright! Just leave it to me!
dialogue.improvement_fail: I'm sorry... I couldn't improve it...
dialogue.lsc_open: Please try out Large Ship Construction when you have enough resources and materials to spare!
dialogue.shop_open: Thank you for your patronage! Welcome, how may I help you?
dialogue.shop_choose_item: Right, this one! Are you sure you want this?
dialogue.shop_thanks: Thank you very much! Thank you for your continued custom, admiral!

hourly.0000: 0000, Midnight... Shouldn't you be resting soon?
hourly.0100: 0100. Aren't you sleepy after all? Eh? Me? I'm fine!
hourly.0200: 0200. I've somehow remembered my time at Truk... I sure worked hard.
hourly.0300: 0300. About Palau… I wonder why? I don't really remember much of it.
hourly.0400: 0400. It's morning soon, yeah? Admiral? You sure you're fine with not sleeping tonight?
hourly.0500: 0500. The sky is gradually getting brighter! It's a brand new day!
hourly.0600: 0600. Admiral? What will you have for breakfast? It's not anywhere near Mamiya's level, but my cooking is unexpectedly good, you know?
hourly.0700: 0700. It's morning, huh. Should we go and wake the sleepy heads up?
hourly.0800: 0800, huh. Now! Time to get the repairs on!
hourly.0900: 0900. Which ship would you like me to repair? …Eh!? It can't be… a sortie!?
hourly.1000: 1000. …Admiral? For me, battles are a bit… ah… no… even if you load me with all these weapons…
hourly.1100: 1100. You're too reckless admiral. It'll be hell if the work machines broke down!
hourly.1200: 1200. It's afternoon! It's Akashi curry time! What do you say?!
hourly.1300: 1300. I'll be doing the inspection of ship interior factory! There's quite a lot of it~
hourly.1400: 1400. It's about time I dive fully into the afternoon repairs, okay?
hourly.1500: 1500. Admiral? Don't you feel a little hungry now? Hmm?
hourly.1600: 1600. Mamiya Monaka is really tasty, isn't it! I would like to make some in the ship too...
hourly.1700: 1700. The sun will be setting soon. Oof… It's been tiring, yeah.
hourly.1800: 1800. Do you want to eat out for dinner? Like the Yamato hotel, perhaps... just a joke, really.
hourly.1900: 1900. I'm sorry it's only something simple, but dinner is ready!
hourly.2000: 2000 I guess a full stomach really makes you sleepy, huh… Yaaawnn… Ah-- I shouldn't!
hourly.2100: 2100, huh. The day will be ending in three more hours. Thanks for the good work.
hourly.2200: 2200 Nights at the anchorage sure is quiet, huh… It'll be nice if it stays like this…
hourly.2300: 2300 Admiral? Thank you for your hard work for today!
